entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
